HouseofLords Session 2001- 02Judgments-ReginavEastSussexCountyCouncil(Appellants)ExParteReprotech(Pebsham)Ltd.(Respondents)andOneOtherActionHOUSEOFLORDS
Lord Nicholls of Birkenhead Lord Mackay of Clashfern Lord Hoffmann Lord Hope of Craighead Lord Scott of Foscote OPINIONSOFTHELORDSOFAPPEALFORJUDGMENTINTHECAUSE REGINA V EAST SUSSEX COUNTY COUNCIL (APPELLANTS) EX PARTE REPROTECH (PEBSHAM) LIMITED (RESPONDENTS) AND ONE OTHER ACTIONON 28 FEBRUARY 2002 [2002] UKHL 8

P.SENT: It was vested in a company owned by the council called East Sussex Enterprises Ltd ("ESEL").
Regulation 9(1) of the Town and Country Planning General Development Order 1988 SI 1988 No. 1813 ("the General Development Order") required the application to be in writing and to-
The successful bidder was Reprotech (Pebsham) Limited ("Reprotech") which offered ~~#163;5.7 million for ESEL's assets and undertaking.
